game_description: Want to make exercise fun? Punch, stretch, squat and step your way to fitness in this 360° game that will get you working up a sweat in no time. Designed with positive energy and mental wellbeing in mind, Hitstream takes you to stunning locations across the globe, bringing the outdoor world to you at a time when so much of it is off limits. Punch up, down, forward, to the side … catch the orbs, dodge the walls and, if you’re feeling really energetic, turn squats on. Just make sure you keep an eye out for where they’re coming from next! Every action is perfectly timed to the beat of the music, with soundtracks that have been specially selected to take you on a range of journeys, from uplifting adventures that work on agility to hard-hitting routines that build strength and stamina. Additional challenges await those who achieve a score of 90% or more -- can you make the grade?
review_1: Hitstream is an innovative fitness app that combines immersive visuals, exhilarating music, and dynamic body movements to create a workout experience like no other. It's not just a fitness app - it's an escape from the daily grind, where you can forget you're exercising and have fun instead. And, comparing it to other major fitness apps, it's at the high end for calorie burn, plus you WILL spend more time in cardio and peak heart rate zones than many of its major competitors. I'm a huge fitness fanatic, and I mean HUGE...and I LOVE this app!
review_2: I really like the Game and timing ist great most of the time, but i feel like some songs are really off constantly, for example the last 2 songs from the 30 minute exercise in session 2. This is especially bad because i really like the other songs here. I also haven’t found an option to choose single tracks individually if there even is one. Overall, I would totally recommend the game.
review_3: A great app. The beat of the music works very well with the game. Love the exercise. Enjoyed the demo version and love the full game even more. Thank you
review_4: I've been on Hitstream for nearly a year. It's enabled me to regain fitness that I've not had for years. To the point that several people have said I look super fit! It's stretching enough to get my heart to its maximum. Workouts go through aerobic to anaerobic. I use it on average 5 times a week, yes addicted! The songs/tunes are nicely varied across most styles and feature some amazing artists. The choreography is very well put together and gives a wide variety of movements. Love it!
review_5: Previously gave this 5 stars and am now reducing the amount to 4. Game is good but now needs updates such as songs. Squatting setting doesn’t seem correct as it doesn’t drop low enough even with half squats off. Also need ability to change colors of the targets.
